title: Creative Technologist
content:
As a creative technologist, you will be working closely with the creative, production departments -Verticurl hub to Ideate and prototype novel solutions that answer our clients briefs. Develop digital products and services that create remarkable experiences for consumers. You are our go-to creative for new technologies and have knowledge in one or more of the following fields: Metaverse, NFT, AR, MR, VR, bots, physical computing, game development, Machine Learning, Computer Vision and stuff we didn't even think of capitalising yet. 
You might work across wide areas of technology and require the guidance for creating a user experience that is not only creative but is grounded in best practices and technical proofs-of-concept. You are well versed in a variety of development languages, prototyping platforms and tools and you are able to assess the feasibility of technical ideas. We are looking for an individual who is curious and likes to experiment and explore new technologies. 
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

Develop concept and technical requirement to enable the concept  
Build prototypes on a variety of technologies coming out of ideation. 
Participate in brainstorm sessions with the creative and innovation teams. 
Explore and integrate new technologies. 
Perform debugging procedures, code improvement, and re-designing tasks. 
Keeping abreast with advancements in application design and new technologies. 
Present ideas or prototypes to internal and external marketing/technical audiences. 
Implement functional technical development of prototypes  
Contribute to discussions about the digital aspects of creative campaigns. 
Present ideas or prototypes to mixed client marketing / technical audiences 

REQUIREMENT:

Bachelor’s Degree/ Diploma in Interactive Media, Design Communication, 3D design or a related field is a big plus for this position. 
Good knowledge of the various software options used in the field for design and rapid prototyping (Adobe Creative Suite, Spark AR Studio, or TouchDesigner) and tinkering tools (Arduino, Raspberry Pie) 
Experience with designing interactive web, JavaScript, HTML and/or related software and hardware. 
Thinker-doer with amiable personalities, positive outlooks, and expert communication skills. Organisational skills and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment are also beneficial. 
Front-end development – HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular 
Backend development – NodeJS, Solidity or other backend languages 
Experience with creative development platforms such as Unity, Unreal Engine, TouchDesigner, Processing. 
Familiarity with modern design tools - Blender, Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects. 
At Ogilvy, our people are at the heart of what we do: a creative agency that sparks game-changing ideas across culture and business through collaboration, integrity, and a celebration of self-expression. 
We believe in building powerful teams with purpose. This means hiring and nurturing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, abilities, sexual orientation, and gender identities – and we relentlessly curate transformative initiatives that make our commitment to fairness, and equity a reality. 
Our ultimate mission is to leave a positive impact on the world, creating a better future for all, while supporting and uplifting the global communities we serve.  This is central to our mantra of Borderless Creativity.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.
